text: Christian Wilhelm Bronisch was a Sorbian priest and linguist . He wrote about the deity Flins.Krzysztof R. Mazurski: Świeradów-Zdrój i okolice. Warszawa: Wydawnictwo „Sport i Turystyka”, 1986, s. 29-30. ISBN 83-217-2561-9. ==References== Category:Linguists Category:1788 births Category:1881 deaths
title: Christian Wilhelm Bronisch
